mean_cn: adj. 直接的，直率的，坦白的，豪爽的；  adv. 马上，立即；  n. 直路
mean_en: honest and direct :providing answers or information in a very clear and direct way
short_phrase: be forthright with his two girlfriends
sentence: I'm very forthright with my girlfriends: they both know I see other people.
sentence_trans: 我对我的女友们很坦白，她们都知道我在和其他人约会。
